name: BRUSH: New World
description:
BRUSH: New World is the first official release of a series I am looking to create. Take control of the powerful Cosmic Brush and paint the world around you!

Harness the power of your brushes to create unique worlds.

  • Builder Brush: Shift, Copy, Paste, and Rotate shapes to your desire. Use bridging to combine shapes or merge them all with the Fusion Editor.
  • Surface Brush: Paint textures onto your shape to give them interactive properties.
  • Nature Brush: Plant trees or change the seasons to breathe life into your canvas.
  • Element Brush: Shoot projectiles straight from your brush into hordes of monsters.  Get strategic in a tower defense way.
  • Light Brush: When the sun sets make sure you keep your path bright.
  • Sky Brush: Control the weather to build upon your immersive experience.

Fire Monsters tend to get destructive when a shape is in its way.  Put out large fires by conjuring up some rain. Your creativity will aid you in keeping your canvas together.

  • Purple Monsters: Tricky little Monsters have the ability to scale walls. Keep your distance and don't let them steal the Cosmic Brush!
  • Earth Monsters: The strongest of the bunch.  These ones have the power to break your shapes into pieces. 
  • Fire Monsters: Blazing fast and annoying too. Get these little guys to simmer down quickly before they burn everything in sight.

The Fusion Editor is an extremely powerful tool that allows you to combine shapes and give them purpose. Create elevators, flying contraptions, machine guns, or even a simple sliding door! 

Node-based graphs make creating machines intuitive and fast-paced.

If the Element Brush just isn't enough you can protect yourself within massive castles or reinforced bases. Mix that with a couple of Fusion Shapes and you will be unstoppable.

Finally, expand your palette... Literally. Build a synthesis pool to mix colors together with ease. You can even combine surface colors with the Element Brush or Nature Brush for more exotic choices. 

This game is a passion project of mine. I would love to hear feedback and continue to build upon it as time goes on. Eventually, if things go according to plan I can bring BRUSH to many other platforms. This is in addition to the following planned features:

  • Online Mode
  • Interior Design Brush
  • Landscape & Earth Tools
  • A really, REALLY large addition to the color palette

So what are you waiting for? Check out the first release of BRUSH: New World!
